data.text: Ma e wach mane Nyasaye onyiso Isaya wuod Amoz e fweny kuom Babulon:
Chunguru bandera ewi got motwo
Asegolo chik ne joga maler;
Winjuru kaka koko wuok e gode;
Gibiro ka gia e pinje man mabor,
Denguru nimar odiechieng Jehova Nyasaye chiegni;
Nikech wachni, lwet ngʼato ka ngʼato ne jony,
Kibaji nogogi malich,
Neuru, odiechieng Jehova Nyasaye biro,
Sulwe mag polo kod lergi ok nonenre.
Abiro kumo piny kuom timbene mamono,
Abiro miyo ji doko manok moloyo dhahabu mopwodhi,
Kuom mano Jehova Nyasaye Maratego nomi polo tetni,
Mana kaka mwanda ma jodwar lawo,
Ngʼato angʼata manomaki nochwo matho,
Nyithindgi madhoth nochwad piny e wangʼ-gi ka gineno,
Neuru, anakel jo-Media,
Gibiro chielo yawuowi matindo gi asere;
Babulon ma en piny maber moloyo pinjeruodhi duto,
Onge ngʼat manochak obedi e iye
To mana le mag thim ema nodag kanyo,
Ondiegi noywagre kuondegi mane gigeno,
